name: Tower Attack (itch) (QuestTaker)
description:
Greetings and welcome to Tower Attack! A reversed role, tower defense game. You control the dispensable minion laying siege to the enemy. Your goal is very simple. Get to the castle and destroy its gate. Sounds simple enough... right? Good luck, there are plenty more where you came from... Made by Mini and Cooper (Mini-Cooper) for the 2021 VR Super Jam, opposites theme. 

External Unity addons used: 

Top-Down Dungeons 2 

StylizedProceduralSkybox

 Seven Swords 

Fantasy Adventure Environment 

Music used: 

ROYALTY-FREE Epic Victory Music Royalty Free Instrumental Music Royalty Free by MUSIC4VIDEO 

Enchanted Valley Kevin MacLeod Royalty-Free Music No Copyright Music YouTube Music
